narrative_arc: Moving from a struggle with chaotic, ephemeral insights towards building a 'Living System' (IES) that harmonizes with the natural nonlinear flow of the mind. A journey from fighting the brain's nature to engineering systems that amplify it.
current_chapter: Architecting the Intelligent Exploration System (IES) to solve the 'Zero-to-Start' and 'Structure-from-Chaos' problems.
